text: Ami emani bhabe taderake jagrata karalama, yate tara paraspara jijnasabada kare. Tadera ekajana balalah tomara katakala abasthana karecha? Tadera ke'u balalah ekadina athaba ekadinera kichu ansa abasthana karachi. Ke'u ke'u balalah tomadera palanakarta'i bhala janena tomara katakala abasthana karecha. Ekhana tomadera ekajanake tomadera e'i mudrasaha sahare prerana kara; se yena dekhe kona khadya pabitra. Atahpara ta theke yena kichu khadya niye ase tomadera jan'ya; se yena namrata sahakare yaya o kichute'i yena tomadera khabara ka'uke na janaya.
